00688     virtual bool SetController(ControllerBasePtr controller, const std::string& args) RAVE_DEPRECATED {
00689         std::vector<int> dofindices;
00690         for(int i = 0; i < GetDOF(); ++i) {
00691             dofindices.push_back(i);
00692         }
00693         return SetController(controller,dofindices,1);
00694     }
